channel.title: Posts on HORIZON
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on HORIZON

item.title: BugFlow
item.description: 基础问题 AttributeError: module ‘XXX’ has no attribute ‘xxx’ 原因：一般module和attribute的名字没有拼错的情况下，出现这类问题通常是因为这个py文件所在的目录中存在与module同名的py文件，导致python的错误调用。 解决办法：更改文件名。 Keras TypeError: Unexpected keyword argument passed to optimizer: name Traceback (most recent call last): File "visualizing_the_convnet.py", line 3, in <module> model = load_model('cats_and_dogs_small_2.h5') File "D:\ProgramFiles\Anaconda3\envs\keras\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\keras\engine\saving.py", line 249, in load_model optimizer_config, custom_objects=custom_objects) File "D:\ProgramFiles\Anaconda3\envs\keras\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\keras\optimizers.py", line 838, in deserialize printable_module_name='optimizer') File "D:\ProgramFiles\Anaconda3\envs\keras\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\keras\utils\generic_utils.py", line 194, in deserialize_keras_object return cls.from_config(cls_config) File "D:\ProgramFiles\Anaconda3\envs\keras\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\keras\optimizers.py", line 159, in from_config return cls(**config) File "D:\ProgramFiles\Anaconda3\envs\keras\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\keras\optimizers.py", line 247, in __init__ super(RMSprop, self).
